title: Lucy Frazer – 2023 Speech at the Gambling with Lives Annual Parliamentary Forum
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Lucy Frazer, the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport, on 1 March 2023.
content:
Culture Secretary speaks ahead of the publication of the gambling white paper.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
